file_content.text: I finally tracked down Vik. He's coming with me.
Yeah. I heard about the prototype weapons. You think giving them back makes up for years of Republic mistakes?
I don't have any agenda--the weapons belong on Balmorra.
I'm just doing what's right.
Yeah, right.
I've done everything I could for your people, and you still treat me like dirt.
You're impossible to please.
When the Republic finally lives up to its promises and the Empire is off Balmorra for good, we'll talk. Until then, you're nothing to me.
Obviously, giving you the prototypes was a mistake. I should've held on to them.
Why don't I keep them instead?
I thought that was standard procedure for you Republic types. You take what's useful and run when things get tough.
Yeah, I heard. He was in the middle of the deepest raid into Imperial territory I've seen. Sobrik, the Balmorran Arms Factory... I heard he hit them all.
Vik is definitely good at working behind enemy lines.
He's very skilled.
Like I said, he's one of the best I've got.
It was hard to get Vik to back down. He really wanted to save Balmorra.
[Lie] Yeah, he's a real hero.
He understands what we've been through.
Vik was out for credits, pure and simple.
It was all a scam.
I don't believe that for a second.
I'd like to say it's been a pleasure having you here, Captain, but we both know that's a lie.
Come back when Havoc Squad is done showboating all over the galaxy. We'll put you to work for a real cause.
Good luck in the battle for Balmorra, Ardon.
I wish you well.
When I'm done saving the Republic, maybe I'll stop by.
Very funny.
You couldn't pay me enough to work with you, Ardon. I'm leaving.
Don't hold your breath.
General Garza sent me a message explaining everything. I've got Vik's current assignment details right here.
Glad to hear that the Republic's finest aren't here to help, but to take away one of my best men instead. We're honored, really.
Havoc Squad needs a demolitions expert.
Vik's skills are needed.
Of course. And what Havoc needs, Havoc gets.
We wouldn't be taking Vik if the situation wasn't serious.
I'm sorry this had to happen.
I know, I know. Everything is more important than Balmorra to you people.
Lose the attitude.
Or what? It's not like you and your publicity-stunt squad are doing anything useful for me anyway.
Vik is taking one of our teams on a patrol run. Their next stop is our signal interception post--you can catch up with him there.
Now, if that's all--there are real soldiers who need my time.
Thank you for your cooperation.
That's all.
Oh, anything for the Republic.
I don't mean to put you in a bad place, sir.
I'm sorry, all right?
I'm really not interested in what you mean to do.
If you've got a problem with me or my squad, do something about it.
Nobody talks to me that way.
Havoc fights harder in a day than your people fight in a year, Ardon. Don't waste your posturing on us.
We've got nothing else to talk about.
I'll stick to fighting the Imperials, thanks.
...so let's focus on those war mechs landing on the plateau.
Ah. Look, it's one of our dependable friends from the Republic. Meeting's over, people--I wouldn't dream of keeping a Republic officer waiting.
I'm not interested in your opinions. I'm interested in Tanno Vik.
Whine to someone else.
Don't worry, I know how much a Balmorran's opinion is worth to you people.
I'm just here to do my job, sir.
Don't blame me!
Yeah, never heard that one before.
I'm here to speak with Tanno Vik. Do you know where I can find him?
Much obliged.
We're done. I've got things to do.
Vik is probably the only reason you're leaving the prototypes. He understood what Balmorra's been through, I could always tell.
I don't care what you think, Ardon. I've got places to be.
Believe what you like.
Yeah, I'll bet you do.
Vik was adamant that those prototypes go directly to the Balmorran resistance.
[Lie] Yeah, he's a real hero.
Yeah, that's what I figured.
Vik wanted the prototypes for himself. He doesn't care about Balmorra.
You couldn't be more wrong.
What a load of garbage.
Now, Vik'll be strolling around Coruscant with your lot, making publicity holos while the rest of us fight. What a waste.
I'll make sure your man sees plenty of action, Ardon.
Vik won't go to waste.
Let's hope so.
What happens to Vik now is Republic business.
That isn't your concern.
Republic wastefulness, you mean.
Havoc Squad fights harder than any other unit in this war.
You're full of it.
Yeah, I'm sure that's what your CO tells you all the time.
Let's go, people.
